title: TRP and Bosch Partner on a New Integrated Electronic Groupset for E-Bikes: Eurobike 2024
content:
Automatic shifting is coming to your next drop bar e-bike, courtesy of Bosch and TRP.

Read the full article at TRP and Bosch Partner on a New Integrated Electronic Groupset for E-Bikes: Eurobike 2024 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
